title: Australian diary. No. 024
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board and Jack S. Allan
brief_description: This interesting cinemagazine features the following items: a look at the life of Dr. Geoffrey Young, a flying doctor in the outback; mulga wood crafts and holidaying on the Great Barrier Reef, one of the world’s greatest coral wonderlands.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian National Film Board and Jack S. Allan
